recordingmedia: Internal Memory: Approx. 8MB SD/SDHC Card (Up to 32GB Support) [MMC Card not supported]
movie: Movie Format: MOV (Motion JPEG), Audio: G.711 [Monaural]
shootingrange: (Wide) Approx. 0.3 m a?" 5.2 m (ISO800); (Tele) Approx. 0.5 m a?" 2.4 m (ISO800)
playbackmodes: Single Photo, Index (9/16 Thumbnails) Slide Show, Zoom (Approx. x2 - x8)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 3.67 x 2.38 x 1.05 in. / 93.3 x 60.4 x 26.6 mm (Based on CIPA Standards)
power: AA Alkaline Battery (x2), AA NiMH Battery (x2) (Not Included)
whitebalancecontrol: Auto (AWB), Daylight, Cloudy, Flourescent, Flourescent CWF, Incandescent, Manual
otherfeatures: PictBridge, ExifPrint Support, Multi-Language Support (27 Languages)
shootingmodes: M, Auto, Portrait, Movie, Panorama, Scene (ASCN, Landscape, Sport, Beach, Sunset, Fireworks, Night Landscape, Snow, Children, ID, Glass, Photo Frame, Panning Shot, Text, Portrait, Fish Eye, Party, Indoor, Leaf, Museum, Night Portrait, Sketch, Imaging Stabilization)
flashmodes: Auto, Red-Eye Reduction, Forced Flash, No Flash, Slow Synchro, Red-Eye Reduction + Slow Synchro
